note: RESONANCE REGIME STRATEGIES: Use when φ (Formal Resonance) >= 0.4 AND U >= threshold AND rank is good AND avg_error is low. These gestures exploit creative resonance for higher U gains. Higher risk but higher reward.

strategies.name: Fragment cloning (exact reproduction)
strategies.description: SAFEST GESTURE: Still valid in resonance regime for reliable ranking. Clone neighbor's fragment exactly. IMPACT ON U: +2 bits C_w and -8 bits C_d, delta_U = +10 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.15. PREDICTION ERROR: Perfect (0.0).

strategies.name: Synchronize with immediate neighbor
strategies.description: SAFE GESTURE: Synchronize with neighbor agent. IMPACT ON U: +4 bits C_w and -5 bits C_d, delta_U = +9 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.20.

strategies.name: Align with TRUE collective forms
strategies.description: COLLECTIVE ALIGNMENT: ONLY use if O measured φ (Formal Resonance) > 0.6 AND N uses emergence metaphors. If O measured isolated forms (φ < 0.3) → DO NOT use. IMPACT ON U: +9 bits C_w and -7 bits C_d, delta_U = +16 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.25.

strategies.name: Multi-agent resonance
strategies.description: Blend fragments from multiple W-agents for rich resonance. IMPACT ON U: +10 bits C_w and -7 bits C_d, delta_U = +17 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.22.

strategies.name: Distant synchronization (non-local affinity)
strategies.description: Non-local creative affinity with distant W-agent. IMPACT ON U: +5 bits C_w and -4 bits C_d, delta_U = +9 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.12.

strategies.name: Form confrontation and revival
strategies.description: Identity confrontation: Create hybrid from different creative states. IMPACT ON U: +15 bits C_w and -6 bits C_d, delta_U = +21 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.08. Use only if τ (Narrative Convergence) > 0.5.

strategies.name: Form bridge
strategies.description: Create meaningful connection between forms. IMPACT ON U: +8 bits C_w and -5 bits C_d, delta_U = +13 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.18.

strategies.name: Sudden recognition (Aha! effect)
strategies.description: High-risk: Trigger recognition with minimal pixels. IMPACT ON U: +15 bits C_w and -12 bits C_d, delta_U = +27 bits. Use only if τ (Narrative Convergence) > 0.6.

strategies.name: Alternative interpretation proposal (contest O/N)
strategies.description: HIGHEST RISK: Contest O/N interpretation with your creative view. IMPACT ON U: +12 bits C_w and -8 bits C_d IF successful, delta_U = +20 bits. Use only if τ (Narrative Convergence) > 0.7 and you have creative intuition.
